content: Peter was an altruistic video game player; he would give items to people who needed them, rather than selling them for personal profit.
translations: ita:Peter era un videogiocatore altruista; avrebbe dato oggetti a gente che ne avrebbe avuto bisogno piuttosto che venderli
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by AlanF_US (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
